uhh_lt.newsleak.reader

Class NewsleakCsvStreamReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.resource.Resource_ImplBase
      • org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource_ImplBase
        • org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader_ImplBase
          • org.apache.uima.fit.component.CasCollectionReader_ImplBase
            • uhh_lt.newsleak.reader.NewsleakReader
              • uhh_lt.newsleak.reader.NewsleakCsvStreamReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.collection.base_cpm.BaseCollectionReader, org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader, org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource, org.apache.uima.resource.Resource

    public class NewsleakCsvStreamReader
extends NewsleakReader
    The Class NewsleakCsvStreamReader expects externally generated data for a data import into newsleak. The importer needs 2 files (their paths can be configured in the preprocessing configuration file): - documents.csv: a 4-column CSV (RFC4180 format) with document id (Integer), fulltext (may contain line breaks), Date-time, and document language code (optional) - metadata.csv: a 4-column CSV (comma separator) with document id, metadata key, metadata value, metadata type (e.g. Text) See data/document_example.csv and data/metadata_example.csv for example files. Metadata will not be handled by this reader, but imported directly in the @see uhh_lt.newsleak.preprocessing.InformationExtraction2Postgres processor.
